import React from 'react' function CreateBidPage() { const submitProduct = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("product submitted"); const categoryy = e.target.category.value const product = { name: e.target.product.value, description: e.target.description.value, category: { "tv": "category of all TV display" }, price: e.target.price.value, features: { width: e.target.width.value, height: e.target.height.value, color: e.target.color.value, weigth: e.target.weight.value, }, images: { main: e.target.image.value, }, merchant_id: "1" }; dispatch(addProduct(product)); }; return(
{/* PRODUCT IMAGE */}
{/* PRODUCT FEATURES */} {/* */}
Back {/* */}
) } export default CreateBidPage
